title: Person Of Interest S1E1 - The beginning - Part 3
author: Morgs K
comment: Series Person of interest is like an addiction does not go away.
After watching this series, I just can't imagine, anyone else except Jim Cavaziel portraying this character.
Man i think im going to watch this series again.
Took me a while to realize he wakes up in a different room.
I'd love to see Jim as Bruce Wayne/Batman
description: Finch convinces Reese to help him prevent crime - ** Note that JC has toned up significantly since the Pilot**
